title: portfolio website
full_text: That's this site! This is a relatively simple website created with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JS. It is bundled using Vite and deployed on GH-Pages. This portfolio site is intended to be a simple place to showcase some of my work. This website isn't done yet!

title: game dev
short_text: hobby game development using various engines
full_text: Throughout my studies and also through personal projects I have spent a bit of time doing game dev. Most of these are done using Unity, but I have also used other engines for other languages, such as Python and Lua. These are tons of fun to make, most can be found here https://jofbob.itch.io/

title: language identification
short_text: mobile spoken LID using machine learning
full_text: As part of my final project of my undergrad I led a team of 6 to complete a project working with the State Emergency Service here in Tasmania. The project aimed to create a mobile application to identify spoken language using machine learning. This was implemented using Flutter, and Python for the ML using TensorFlow. I gained a lot of experience working with audio processing, Tensorflow, Flutter development, and collaboration on this project, it was a lot of fun!
